front.title: Mail and Netnews Header Registration Procedure

abstract.t: Various IETF standards and http, e-mail and netnews softwareproducts use various http, e-mail and netnews header fields. Thisdocument specifies a procedure for the registration of http,e-mail and netnews header field names, to reduce the risk that twodifferent products use the same header field name in differentways (homonyms) or that several different header field names areused with identical meaning (synonyms).
